Supergirl TV Talk 2×04: “Survivors”

01 Nov 2016
Podcasts Supergirl TV Talk

This week on Supergirl TV Talk, Frank and Tim talk alien fight clubs, Maggie & Alex, Mon-El & Winn’s bromance, and so much more. Plus, where’s James?!
